name: Still the Moon
description:
Welcome to Still the Moon, launching commences in 10 seconds, you must quickly but carefully prepare your rocket; set your course to the moon in the lowest distance possible, align your boosters to ensure there is no angular drag and fill your fuel tanks

Blast off into space, avoiding asteroids and collecting stardust to proceed, the further you get the more stardust you collect after each run, use stardust to upgrade your rocket and keep going until you reach the Moon

This game was made in 72h during the Mini Jam 130: Lunar Gamejam, unfortunately I ran out of time before implementing any sound effects or music, feedback appreciated!
